root.description: This application allows reprojecting a vector data using support image projection reference, or a user specified map projection

parameter.name: Input vector data
parameter.description: The input vector data to reproject

parameter.name: Use image keywords list
parameter.description: Optional input image to fill vector data with image kwl.

parameter.name: Image used to get projection map
parameter.description: Projection map will be found using image metadata

parameter.name: Default elevation
parameter.description: This parameter allows setting the default height above ellipsoid when there is no DEM available, no coverage for some points or pixels with no_data in the DEM tiles, and no geoid file has been set. This is also used by some application as an average elevation value.
